title: Allowing for a public library taxing district to withdraw from a regional system of cooperating libraries with no discretion regarding approval of such withdrawal by the state library board.

other_titles.title: AN ACT concerning public libraries; relating to withdrawal from a regional system of cooperating libraries; allowing such withdrawal upon certain conditions with no discretion regarding approval of such withdrawal by the state library board; amending K.S.A. 75-2549, 75-2550 and 75-2551 and repealing the existing sections.

actions.description: Prefiled for Introduction on Friday, November 21, 2025
